motivational.text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivational.author: Walt Disney

motivational.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
motivational.author: Will Rogers

motivational.text: You learn more from failure than from success.
motivational.author: Unknown

motivational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

love.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
love.author: William Shakespeare

love.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.text: Where there is love there is life.
love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

love.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.text: We are most alive when we're in love.
love.author: John Updike

love.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.author: Loretta Young

love.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.text: Love is friendship that has caught fire.
love.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.text: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.text: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.text: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Saint Augustine

funny.text: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
funny.author: Tommy Cooper

funny.text: I told my computer I needed a break, and it said 'No problem â€” I'll go to sleep.'
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: I would lose weight, but I hate losing.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I was supposed to do.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.text: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
funny.author: Unknown
